thread.section_title: Goway Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Goway Travel | goway.com
thread.title: Wendy Woolley
thread.title_full: Goway Travel reviewed by Wendy Woolley

author: Wendy Woolley
title: Wendy Woolley
text: Patrick put together a pre cruise package in Hong Kong for us. The hotel selected was as described, in an excellent location. Tours were as described and very interesting. Documentation rec'd was thorough and we had the information we needed. We were alerted to a change in one of the tours prior to departure. We will use go way travel to help us plan another adventure.
